title: Can a woman be in seclusion with a man who has alzheimer's / dementia? - assim al hakeem
transcript: Alzheimer is a disease or a weakness or deficiency that affects people at an older age now it is degrees if a person reaches the stage where he becomes unconscious he has this form of dementia he is unaware of the people present in his room and those who are present they would not recognize whether they are his wife his daughter his mother or any other stranger and he has no power no control no ability to choose such a person is regarded as insane and not a sane person so the rulings do not apply to him so yes you can serve him you can be in seclusion with him because he is not sane where the rulings of Halal and Haram May apply to him and Allah Knows Best
